div.p: This code system https://interop.esante.gouv.fr/ig/fhir/vs/CodeSystem/fr-cs-vs-plandefinition-actions defines the following codes in an undefined hierarchy:

tr.td: Request the initiation of a reporting workflow for a patient for a specific context (e.g., encounter).
Execute a series of actions to accomplish reporting
This is top level action that uses other defined actions to accomplish reporting for a specific context (e.g., encounter).
Evaluate candidate patient's data against trigger codes to determine reportability
Evaluate candidate patient's data against trigger codes to determine reportability.
Evaluate participants in encounter for reportability
Evaluate encounter participants such as patient, practitioner, organization on whether they have been selected for reportability.
Create a report for submission to a PHA or a Research Organization

Create a Report containing data for patients or participants who have been identified by other medmorph plandefinition actions such as initiate-reporting-workflow, check-trigger-codes and check-participant-registration.
Validate Report against specified profiles and terminologies.
Validate Report against specified profiles and terminologies.
Submit the report to specified endpoint
Submit the report to specified endpoint.
Deidentify the report before submitting the report
Deidentify the report before submitting the report.
Anonymize the report before submitting the report
Anonymize the report before submitting the report.
Pseudonymize the report before submitting the report
Pseudonymize the report before submitting the report.
Encrypt the report before submitting the report
Encrypt the report before submitting the report.
Complete the reporting for the patient, after which no further reports will be sent for a specific context (e.g., Encounter).
Extract data from a Data Source for one or more patients.
Extract data from a Data Source for one or more patients for research purposes.
Load extracted data from a Data Source to a data mart.
Extracted data from a Data Source for one or more patients for research purposes.
Request the initiation of terminating a reporting workflow.
This action represents the reporting of a Chronic Disease Surveillance report.

title.value: FR Veille Sanitaire PlanDefinition Action Codes

description.value: The FR Veille Sanitaire PlanDefinition Actions CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying actions in PlanDefinition.
